question.title: How to configure JMH threads as an @Param
question.body:
Is there a way to use JMH (Java Microbenchmark Harness) @Param to runb multiple tests scaling up the workload via the JMH threads. The following doesn't work (compile) for obvious reasons but makes clear what I would like.

@Param({1, 2, 4, 8})
int threads;

@Benchmark
@Group
@GroupThreads(threads)
public void actor(ThreadState state) {...}

answers.body:
Currently I manually define each test which "works" but, by not using @Param, doesn't report neatly in a way I can paste directly into a spreadsheet.

@Benchmark
@Group("threads2")
@GroupThreads(2)
public void actor2(ThreadState state) {...}

@Benchmark
@Group("threads4")
@GroupThreads(4)
public void actor4(ThreadState state) {...}
